name: MOG: the escape
description:
MOG: the escape game is an adventure game, in which you the player control MOG (pronounced emoji), to the gate at the end of each level. Each level comes with it's challenges. Have fun :)

***** FEATURES *****

YOUR MAIN CHARACTER - your main character is an emoji, Yes! An emoji.‎

DIFFERENT TERRAINS - each stage has its different terrain and surprises.‎

TO THE GATE! - your mission/objective in this game is to get MOG to the gate and through it.‎

PICK UPS - MOG: the escape, has series of pickups. 

SPOILER ALERT! - You'll get to see them as you advance in the game.
